description:
During this course, parents explore ways to increase student achievement. This course is designed to delve deeper into the lessons presented â€œParent Support: 30 Ways to Support Your Child's Education". The strategies learned are applicable to parents of learners of all ages; they are also transferable across subject areas. With guidance and quality tools, parents learn how to demonstrate a direct relationship between children's learning styles and study strategies.

Upon completion of Part 1, parents have the skills to leverage learning style toward educational success. To support this process, parents watch videos, complete self-assessment quizzes, participate in live events, and discuss pressing issues related to children's academic performance.

Connect with Jackson Education Support on social media!
title: Discover a 3-Step Plan to Help Children Learn More, Faster
